title: no draft normals hindering my ranked play
body:
ok. so im trying to practice adc/mid/top in normals. 

I can barely ever get these spots due to buggy client not loading fast enough(sometimes it does sometimes it dosn't) and always end up with support most of the time. i dont mind playing support but i wan't to get better at the game winning roles were you can have a bad team yet still win because i find at bronze yoloq playing support is the biggest gamble out of all 5 positions.

why can't draft normals be implemented in oce, it would save a multitude of issues, like instalocking,not getting the role you want, toxicicty and trolling before the game even starts e.t.c

na has had draft normals for years now. give the oce players some love please, give us more then other servers table scraps years later.

replies.body:
I feel ya, I really do. 
I'm also trying to learn to play a different role (maybe ADC or top, haven't decided) so I can stop support 1-tricking and be confident in autofill situations. 

Unfortunately, it isn't a matter of Riot being meanies and not listening to the community because like you and so many others before you have pointed out, It would solve quite a few of the problems, and allow players like us to actually get to try out some of the other roles. 
Ultimately it comes down to what _Brazy Top Laner_ said: the queue times would be absolutely ♥ ♥ ♥ ♥ ♥ ♥. 

Even if we tried replacing blind pick with it, I think the people that main "fill" would start complaining about being forced to support too much. People would also probably complain about the amount of time it takes to get through the champ select, especially when you want a quick game (although anyone that starts a game with "ff@20 because school" should reevaluate their life choices). 

The choice to open up the queue is evaluated on a regular basis, and hopefully eventually our server will have a population deemed "healthy" enough to have the same queue options as our NA and EU friends :D

Yeah I have that problem too. As the lobby opens I get a slight lag so I can't enter my role in time. Also, in norms and arams the mmr seems to be a lot more relaxed and quite often the difference between teams is hundreds of points. Which is fine for me because I making an effort to improve my game and I realize I need that better competition, the problem is though that my teams aren't on the level. I had a game a couple of days ago was 5 unranked and below 30 levels vs a plat 2 silvers and 1 bronze. Like seriously?
I'm currently on 4 wins from my last 20 games yet even in losing teams I'm getting 10-0-11, 4-2-2 and 23-11-22 as adc. What can you do though =-((
Remove blind pick completely and replace with normal draft instead.
we had draft norms for a bit and the queue times were absolutely fucked, although it could maybe work one day a week, its not sustainable long-term

the community is ever growing whats to say that it would not be a hit now..
twisted tree line was not a massive hit and i had to wait 10mins for a game but now only 3mins at a max things take time to grow on people.

but i do agree with you it was bad. just saying it might not be now.

Yeah i was just about to write the same thing but i thought i should check and lord behold others feel the same.

to be honest i played on the NA servers before the oce server started up and apart from a bit of lag it was great.
domination was always a laugh and if you wanted to warm up for ranked drafts is where you did it less problems with draft that's for sure.


Please Riot bring drafts to OCE i am sure it will be a hit and if after 3 months its not getting enough support( queue times are to long ) then shut it down.

The worst thing is getting chat banned for the first few seconds for no reason and losing your lane call because of it.

and I have never been a fan of draft picking, and while I'm not against it, i have never been for it.
Until now... I'm starting to think that the only way to stop there being a Yasuo in every game is to just outright ban him.
